title.narrative: Promotion of agricultural value chain in Yen Bai province

description.narrative: The project aims at economic empowerment for ethnic minority communities, especially for women in Yen Bai province through promoting value chain participation with the following key results: 1- sustainable and climate-resilient agricultural production; 2- improved access to gender sensitive and inclusive financial services.

"One training workshop on value chain - access to market - financing for cooperatives; Supports 5 cooperatives with nearly 90.000 track traceability stamps for better consumption of farmers' products. - Training course on sericulture production for farmers, which helps farmers to change their crop structure to increase income and resilience to climate change. - Training course for cooperative support fund and people's fund in verification of business investment plans for lending. So far, 5 business plans/projects received loans for investment from the provincial support fund and 2 plans from cooperative support fund from YBPCA. - Piloting two cases of women entrepreneurship promotion. - Support of herbal seedlings: cinnamon and Ardisia silvestris for plantations, well-grown now. - Advocacy: provincial People's Committee approved the fund allocation plan 2018 for the project on consolidation and development of cooperatives, collaborative groups for the period 2017 -2022, and towards 2030, in which 34 new cooperatives will be supported for establishment, new technology support to one cooperative, and additional fund of VND 500 million dong for the cooperative support Fund. "

activity-date.narrative: Planned end date of the activity
Planned start date of the activity
